SEARCH
Package net.replaceitem.reconfigure.config.serialization

Class Serializer<T,C>

java.lang.Object
net.replaceitem.reconfigure.config.serialization.Serializer<T,C>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of one property after reading, as provided to the Marshaller, such as a JsonElement or NbtElement.
C - The type of the complete compound object after reading, such as JsonObject. A value of this type will be provided to middleware.
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharSerializer, NbtSerializer
public abstract class Serializer<T,C> extends Object
Base class for implementing serialization and deserialization strategies for a config. Serialization and deserialization happen in two stages:
Serialization stages
File Serializer Config
O ---read---> O ---load---> O
O <--write--- O <--save--- O
In the middle stage, middleware may be added in the form of preLoad and preWrite in order for the mod using the configuration library to do custom handling of data (such as datafixing).
